game.name: Cafe Simulator
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Simulation, Strategy
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build and decorate your shop, diversify your products through alliances, and make the right investments to expand your business.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build and decorate your shop, diversify your products through alliances, and make the right investments to expand your business.
